name: Quadsoup
description:
Ludum Dare 41 entry (theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres") by Václav Patejdl (@the_vaber)

Navigate a futuristic world while being chased by a deadly swarm of energy.

Instructions:

- WASD+Mouse to move, spacebar to jump
- Collect orange orbs to repel the swarm and obtain score
